A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
For any die hard fans of the Star Wars franchise\, do NOT see this movie for you will only be dissapointed. At best\, this is a movie that was 45 minutes too long\, and while it did have some good special effects ultimately felt unsatisfying. At its worst\, this was a poorly written and sloppy attempt by Disney to cash in on fans of a very beloved franchise. 

The entire ark with Finn was just completely unnecessary and did not affect the plot of the movie at all (his character probably should've been kept in a coma). Many questions fans had about characters such as Snoke and Rey's parents went unanswered or were completely written off. Worst of all\, this film was a horrible send out for Carrie Fisher (bless her soul) and did not do her character justice.

By far the worst ever entry into the Star Wars universe\, and a major let down for fans of the franchise.
